mapper.sql: t_house_property_room . id , t_house_property_room.building_id AS buildingId, t_house_property_room.unit_id AS unitId, t_house_property_room.number
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_property_room.* FROM t_house_property_room WHERE t_house_property_room.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_property_room.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_property_room
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_property_room.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_property_room.building_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.buildingId},'%')
AND t_house_property_room.unit_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.unitId},'%')
AND t_house_property_room.number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.number},'%')
AND t_house_property_room.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_property_room.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
